data.title: Libya Floods
data.summary: The Floods have devastated the city of Derna, killing thousands and leaving at least 10,000 missing. The local community needs your urgent support.

featuredImage.alt: Families affected by the floods in Libya receiving much-needed aid and assistance

content.heading: 884,000 affected by the devastation of the Libya flood, every moment matters. Join us in reaching families affected. Your donation saves lives
content.description: Storm Daniel’s impact in Libya has caused catastrophic flooding and landslides, leaving thousands missing and tens of thousands displaced. Rural areas like Derna witness entire buildings swept away due to collapsed dams, adding to the suffering of those already affected by past conflicts and political crises.

content.heading: How is ARCD's Relief responding?
content.description: In the face of Libya’s flood crisis, Africa Relief and Community Development (ARCD) steps forward, providing urgent relief and sustainable strategies. Partnering with the government, we confront the flood’s complexities, placing the well-being of affected communities at the core of our mission. Let’s rebuild, restore, and uplift Libya together.

content.heading: Critical Aid Needed
content.description:
1- Clean Water: Essential to prevent waterborne diseases caused by contaminated floodwaters.
2- Food Supplies: Including feeding projects and non-perishable food items.
3- Clothing, Blankets, and Mattresses: Vital necessities for those who have lost everything in the floods.
4- Your support ensures these essentials reach those in need, safeguarding lives and fostering recovery in the aftermath of the disaster.

content.heading: Empower Survivors
content.description: We’re stronger together. Your donation fuels our swift crisis response, aiding us in reaching people impacted by the emergency.

featuredImage.alt: Impact non profit: Team analyzing data for community improvement projects
